author: Twharr

review: I bought this for my kids and they love it. Really easy to set up and use. Had it up and running in about 15 mins. Just wish it had an off switch because it seems to freeze occasionally and we have to unplug it and plug it back in. It always starts right back up and works fine for a few days after. We started just unplugging it now to save energy anyway.Prime has a ton of movies to pick from. We also have netflix which was easy to set up. Haven't loaded any games yet. Movies I had purchased previously were automatically in my account and purchasing new movies is a snap. Almost too easy for the girls.
author: M&A;

review: This Fire TV has great potential.  I don't understand why more testing was not done to be sure it actually works.  They sent me one and it did everything but stream video.  It took me to the movie page and let me click to start but nothing ever happened.  I could fast forward and see the fast forward moving in a box on the bottom left but that was it.  Pandora worked great!  The Helpdesk couldn't figure out how to make Streaming Video work.  Spent an hour on the phone with an Amazon Tech who by the way was very nice and as helpful as she could have been.  I believe there are many TV sets that this contraption is not compatible with and I also believe Amazon is using the market place to test them.  Don't waste you time, I believe it is a crap shoot on whether or not it will actually work when you get it.
